item.title: Tools
item.description: DIGITAL Computer: Mac mini Drawing device: iPad air Softwares: Drawing, Painting and Animation: Clip studio paint, Procreate, Affinity designer, Dreams and Adobe illustrator Writing: Org mode, VScode(Fountain and Dendron) and The Archive Productivity: Todotxt and Things3 TRADITIONAL Watercolors: Sennelier, Camel and Canvazo Gouache: Brustro Acrylic: Camel & Fevicryl Oil colors: Camel and Winsor & Newton Brushes: Winsor & Newton, Sennelier, Pendel brushpen and Traditional Japanese/ Chinese brushes Nibs: Zebra G Nib, Speedball, Leonardo, Brause and Glass pens Papers: Chitrapath and Brustro Nib holder: Tachikawa and Speedball Inks: Speedball, Rotring, Zig Sumi Ink and Isomars Fountain pens: Kanwrite, Jinhao, Lamy Safari, Muji, Waterman, Cross, Inoxcrom and Sailer Fine liner: Sakura micron Notebooks: Neorah, Royal Talens, Muji and Amazon Basics
